bibl.title: The Significance of the Greek Athletes and Artists at Memphis in Alexander's Strategy after the Battle of Issus.
bibl.note: ARRIAN III, 1, 4. The fact that Alexander summoned the best performers from Athens suggests how important he considered possession of Egypt to be.
BLOEDOW Edmund F., The Significance of the Greek Athletes and Artists at Memphis in Alexander's Strategy after the Battle of Issus.
